name: A124
description: Active - 8m electromagnetic wave that disables enemy skills activation for 20s, inflicts 25 DMG. 75s cooldown

name: Alok
description: Active - Creates a 5m aura that increases movement speed by 15% and restores 5 HP per second for 10s. Effects do not stack. Cooldown 45s.

name: Chrono
description: Active - Creates a 8 sec force field that blocks 800 damage. 75s Cooldown

name: Clu
description: Active - Locate positions of enemies within 80m who are not in prone or squat position. Lasts for 10s. Enemy positions are shared with teammates. Cooldown: 455.

name: Dimitri
description: Active - Creates a 3.5-diameter healing zone. Inside, user and allies recover 10HP/s. When downed, user and allies can self recover to get up. Lasts for 6s. Cooldown 90s.

name: Homer
description: Active - Releases a drone towards nearest enemy within 100m frontal distance creating a 5m diameter pulse which reduces movement speed by 40% and firing speed by 40% for 5s. 25 damage. 60s cooldown

name: Ignis
description: Active - Deploys a 10m-wide flaming screen that lasts 10s and moves forward at 6m/s for up to 5s. While in effect, use the skill again to stop the screen. Enemies (or Gloo Walls) that get in touch with it will instantly take 25 (or 400) DMG, and then take 5 (or 100) DMG/s. Lasts 2s. Cooldown: 60s.

name: Iris
description: Active - For 15s, firing at gloo will mark enemies within 7m and penetrate gloo to damage marked enemies. Max 5 gloo walls. 60s cooldown

name: K
description:
Active - Max. EP increases by 50. 
Jiu-jitsu Mode: Allies within 15m get 600% increase in EP conversion rate. 
Psychology Mode: Recover 3 EP every 1s, up to 250 EP. Mode switch
Cooldown: 6s.

name: Kassie
description:
Active - Basic Therapy (no cooldown): Tap to create a 30m maxx healing bond with a teammate, restoring 3 HP/s for both. The bond breaks if the range is exceeded or can be manually canceled.

Focused Therapy: Tap again to instantly restore 120 HP to the target (The skill will be auto-released while target's HP is below 50. Healing amount will be 80% when used manually.) Cooldown: 45s.

name: Kenta
description:
Active - Forms a shield of 5m width that reduces 60% weapon damage coming from the front. 
When firing, the shield's damage reduction reduces to 20%. Lasts for 5s. Cooldown: 70s.

name: Koda
description: Active - Activates the Aurora power for 10s. Increases movement speed by 15% and discovers enemies behind cover within 50m every 1s (unable to detect those crouching or prone). Cooldown: 45s. (While parachuting, highlights enemy locations within the field of view but the effect is not shared with teammates.)

name: Orion
description: Active - Replaces EP with 300 Crimson Energy. Consumes 200 Crimson Energy to activate its protection, during which you cannot take damage or attack enemies and will absorb 10 HP (ignoring enemy Shield Points) from foes within 5m. Lasts for 3s, during which your movement speed will decrease by 10%. Cooldown: 3s.

name: Ryden
description: Active - Release a destructible explosive spider in the target direction, lasting for 60s. Tap on the skill button again within 10s to stop the spider's movement. The spider will catch the first enemy it spotted within 5m, reduce their speed by 80% and cause them to lose 10 HP/s. Skill effects last for 4s. Cooldown: 60s. 2 kills can be used with 10s between.

name: Santino
description: Active - Spawn a 200 HP mannequin that autonomously travels for 25s. When the mannequin is within 60m, use the skill again to switch positions with it. You can only switch once within 3s, up to 2 time(s) in total. The player who destroys the mannequin will be marked for 5s. Cooldown: 60s.

name: Skyler
description:
Active - Unleashes a sonic wave forward for up to 100m. 
When hitting an obstacle, the wave will explode and deal 500 DMG/s to Gloo Walls within 4m. 
Lasts 6s Cooldown: 45s. Up to 2 skill charges can be stored. Gloo Walls > 5m away is auto aimed.

name: Steffie
description: Active - Creates 4m area where throwables are invalid. Allies in area will restore 10% armor every second and damage from ammo reduce by 20%. Lasts for 15s. 60s cooldown

name: Tatsuya
description: Active - Dashes forward at a rapid speed for 0.3s. This skill can be accumulated for up to 2 uses, with a 1s cooldown between each use. Dash replenish time: 60s.

name: Wukong
description:
Active - Transforms into a bush that lasts for 15s. Cooldown: 90s. 
Transformation ends when Wukong attacks. CD resets when Wukong takes down an enemy.

name: Xayne
description: Active - Enters Xtreme state and instantly obtains 50 temporary Shield Points for 12s during which each knochdown of an enemy restores the temporary Shield Points gained through this skill back to 50 and resets the state duration. Once state ends, the Shield Points earned from this process will be removed. Cooldown: 75s.

name: Alvaro
description: Passive - Explosive weapon dmg increases by 20%, range increased by 10%

name: Alvaro Awaken
description: Passive - 1s before detonating, the grenade produces 3 extra grenades, which can cause 30% damage to their original.

name: Andrew
description: Passive - Armor Durability Loss reduced by 40% and armor DMG reduction increases by 4%. Obtains a 1% DMG reduction bonus for each teammate present within 15m.

name: Andrew Awaken
description: Passive - Armor damage reduction boosted by 8%. An additional 0.15 damage reduction from every teammate carry this skill.

name: Antonio
description: Passive - Gives extra 20 shield point at the start of match and recovers sheild points after surviving combat

name: Caroline
description: Passive - When holding a shotgun, movement speed increase by 16%

name: D-Bee
description: Passive - When firing while moving, movement speed increases by 50%, accuracy increases by 60%

name: Dasha
description: Passive - Highlight Mode: After knocking down an enemy, gain an 18% increase in fire rate and 12% in movement speed for 6s. Continuous knockdowns reset the timer and further boost fire rate by 4% and movement speed by 3%.

name: Ford
description: Passive - Gain 10 HP/s for 4s when taking damage. After releasing an active skill, this passive skill will reset immediately. Cooldown: 20s.

name: Hayato
description: Passive - Every 13% decrease in max HP, Armor penetration increases by 5%

name: J.Biebs
description: Passive - User and allies within 15m can block 8% damage using EP

name: Jai
description: Passive - After knocking down an enemy or using an active skill, 100% of the gun's magazine reloads automatically

name: Joseph
description:
Passive - Become immune from disruptive effects (e.g. slowdown, marking, skill-silencing) and
have a 10% movement speed boost for 55. Cooldown: 45s.

name: Jota
description: Passive - When the skill user is using guns, hitting an enemy recovers some HP and knocking down an enemy recovers 20% HP

name: Kairos
description:
Passive - Defense Mode: Automatically recovers 2 EP/s until full.
Breaker Mode: Activates with full EP when hitting shielded/armored enemies, consuming 5 EP/s. Each hit reduces their Shield Points or Armor Durability by 120% of the damage dealt. Returns to Defense Mode when EP reaches 0.

name: Kapella
description: Passive - Heal teammates with ammo by 20% of the damage dealt. When using a Heal Pistol, increase healing effects by 20%.

name: Kelly
description: Passive - Sprinting speed increases by 6%

name: Kla
description: Passive - Fist damage increase by 400%

name: Laura
description: Passive - Accuracy increases by 50% when scoped in

name: Leon
description: Passive - 4s after being attacked, recover 4HP/s for 15s

name: Lila
description: Passive - When Lila hits an enemy or a vehicle with a rifle, the enemy’s movement slows down by 10% for 3 seconds, and if it’s a vehicle, its speed drops by 50% for 3 seconds.

name: Luna
description: Passive - Increases firing rate by 8%. When user hits an enemy, a max of 15% of firing rate converts to movement speed. Skill resets when user survives combat. Best used with SMG

name: Luqueta
description: Passive - Every elimination increases the max HP by 25, up to 50

name: Maro
description:
Passive - Dmg increases with distance up to 25%
Dmg to marked enemies increases by 3.5%

name: Maxim
description: Passive - Eating mushrooms and using Med Kits faster by 25%

name: Miguel
description: Passive - Gain 200 EP for knocking down an enemy

name: Misha
description: Passive - Driving speed increases by 10%. While in vehicle, character is harder to be targeted at, and damage taken is decreased by 20%

name: Moco
description: Passive - Tag hit enemies for 5s. Info will be shared with teammates

name: Moco Awaken
description: Passive - Markings on hit enemies last longer when they move, up to 11.5s

name: Nairi
description: Passive - Deployed gloo walls restore 250 durability when hit during which teammates within 5m recover 20hp/s. Max 40hp per gloowall

name: Nikita
description: Passive - Reload speed increases by 30%. Every time the skill user hits an enemy, said target will get a 30% healing deduction that lasts for 10s (max. deduction: 30%).

name: Notora
description: Passive - When driving, restores 5 HP every 25 for everyone in the vehicle, up to a maximum of 200 HP.

name: Olivia
description:
Passive - Increase healing effects by 30% and spread 80% of the user's single-target healing
amount to teammates within 15m

name: Otho
description: Passive - After knocking down enemy, mark enemies within 20m and slows their movement by 25%. Lasts for 4s. When user is knocked, marks and slows down nearby enemies

name: Paloma
description:
Passive - Get an additional 120 backpack capacity for ammo, excluding Grenade Launcher. 
(120 AR Ammo, 120 SMG Ammo, 60 Sniper Ammo, 60 SG Ammo)

name: Rafael
description: Passive - When using Snipers or Marksmen rifles, firing sound is silenced and knocked enemies bleed 85% faster

name: Shani
description: Passive - When using an active skill, gives 40 Shield Points to self and team mates within 10m, The Shield Points decay after 5s, after which players can obtain the effect again.

name: Shirou
description: Passive - When user is hit by enemy from within 100m, said attacker is marked for 10s (intel is shared with teammates.) Max 4 markings.

name: Sonia
description: Passive - After taking fatal damage, enter an invulnerable and immobile state for 0.4s. Then, gain a 50 HP shield that lasts for 25. The skill user will be eliminated when the shield disappears. Cooldown: 180s.

name: Suzy
description:
Passive - Your enemy markings have bounty value. Anyone on ally team who eliminates a marked enemy will earn 200 in-match currency. 
You will earn an extra 100 for eliminating an enemy. Receive extra 100 FF Coins from Coin Machines in BR matches.

name: Thiva
description: Passive - The speed of helping up teammates is increased by 70%. The helped up teammates recovers 60HP in 3s

name: Wolfrahh
description: Passive - Every elimination will add one spectator, and the number of spectators will not reduce. With each additional spectator, damage taken from headshots reduces by 7% (max. 21%) and headshot damage to enemies increases by 10% (max. 30%).

name: Oscar
description: Active - Dashes towards the target direction, detonating the first 3 Gloo Walls in the way with 25 DMG, while also dealing 25 DMG to and knocking back enemies encountered. Cooldown: 60s
